name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Lorraine FRAY, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Lorraine FRAY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The order of the Superior Court is reversed. See Commonwealth v. Valette, 531 Pa. 384, 613 A.2d 548 (1992); Commonwealth v. Rambo, 488 Pa. 334, 412 A.2d 535 (1980).
Justice CASTILLE dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gerald A. Stein, Philip J. Degnan, Philadelphia, for Lorraine Fray.
Patrick Meehan, Dist. Atty., A. Sheldon Kovachs, Asst. Dist. Atty., Michelle P. Hutton, Asst. Dist. Atty., Dist. Attorney’s Office, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
745 A.2d 1214
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Lorraine FRAY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 31, 2000.
Decided Feb. 17, 2000.
Gerald A. Stein, Philip J. Degnan, Philadelphia, for Lorraine Fray.
Patrick Meehan, Dist. Atty., A. Sheldon Kovachs, Asst. Dist. Atty., Michelle P. Hutton, Asst. Dist. Atty., Dist. Attorney’s Office, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
